text: I am a Systems Engineering student, passionate about accessible technology. Since 2024, I have dedicated myself to both web development and desktop applications, always seeking to create intuitive and easy-to-use solutions for people of all technological experience levels.

My specialty is front-end development, where I blend creativity and functionality to design modern interfaces. I master technologies for web development and desktop applications, allowing me to approach projects from various perspectives and select the most suitable tool for each need.

I am passionate about projects that directly impact people's lives, especially those with difficulties accessing technology. I firmly believe that innovation must be inclusive, so I strive to create accessible applications for everyone, with clean designs and exceptional user experiences.

In addition to my academic training, I have completed specialized courses in Object-Oriented Programming, Web Design, and PHP, which have provided me with a solid foundation in both web development and desktop applications. I usually work independently, although I also have experience collaborating in multidisciplinary teams.

Outside the development field, I enjoy music, video games, and anime, activities that inspire me creatively and connect me with various forms of artistic expression. This diversity of interests enriches my holistic vision of design and technology.
